author: Kathryn Lundstrom
title: EXCLUSIVE: Ex-Meta Retail Media Lead Steve Biddle Named Chief Commercial Officer at Zitcha
description: The exec is focused on retail advertising's growth.
content:
Retail media platform Zitcha has appointed Steve Biddle as its chief commercial officer, the company told ADWEEK exclusively.
